text: hum ne har insaan ko apne maa baap ke saath accha sulook karne ki nasihath ki hai, haan agar wo ye koshish kare ke aap mere saath ose shareek karle jis ka aap ko ilm nahi to un ka kehna na maniye, tum sab ka lautna meri hee taraf hai, phir main har us cheez se jo tum karte thein tumhe qabar donga
